colour.volume.dataset.optimal_colour_stimuli Module¶

Optimal Colour Stimuli¶

Defines MacAdam Optimal Colour Stimuli for various illuminants in CIE xyY colourspace.

The Optimal Colour Stimuli data is in the form of a dict of ndarray as follows:

{'name': ndarray, ..., 'name': ndarray}

where each ndarray contains a collection of optimal colour stimulus ndarray as follows:

[np.array(['x', 'y', 'Y']], ..., np.array(['x', 'y', 'Y']))

See also

Optimal Colour Stimuli - MacAdam Limits Jupyter Notebook

References

[1]Wikipedia. (n.d.). Surfaces. Retrieved September 10, 2014, from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gamut#Surfaces
